name: @jackoatmon/opencode-plugin-healthd
description: Daemon-mode health checker for OpenCode plugins and MCPs

scripts.stop: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');try{const pid=fs.readFileSync(p.join(require('os').homedir(),'.opencode','healthd.pid'),'utf8').trim();process.kill(Number(pid),'SIGTERM');fs.unlinkSync(p.join(require('os').homedir(),'.opencode','healthd.pid'));console.log('healthd stopped (pid '+pid+')')}catch(e){console.error('healthd not running or pid file missing')}"
